code: import React from'react';import{Card,CardImg,CardBody,CardTitle,CardText,Button}from'reactstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductComponent=_ref=>{let{productos,addToCart}=_ref;if(!productos||productos.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No products available"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:productos.map((producto,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-6 col-md-4 col-lg-3 mb-4 d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[producto.imagen_url&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardImg,{top:true,width:"100%",src:producto.imagen_url,alt:producto.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{className:"d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h5",children:producto.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardText,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price:"})," ",producto.precio,"\u20AC"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"success",className:"mt-auto",onClick:e=>{e.preventDefault();e.stopPropagation();addToCart(producto);},children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})},index))})});};export default ProductComponent;
